title: Dungeon Spirit
summaries: The Dungeon Spirit is a flying Hardmode enemy that spawns in the post-Plantera Dungeon. It can travel through walls and drops Ectoplasm, which can be used to craft many Spectre-related items.

When defeating any enemy with more than 100 maximum health in the Hardmode, post-Plantera Dungeon there is a 7.69*1/13 (7.69%) / 11.11*1/9 (11.11%) / 6.67*1/15 (6.67%) chance of a Dungeon Spirit spawning. Besides, the enemy defeated must be in front of any dangerous dungeon walls to spawn a dungeon spirit. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the enemy must also drop coins, meaning Statue-spawned and Old One's Army enemies do not spawn spirits.
